description: Gets details about a specific task template in the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: TaskTemplateId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the task template.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the task template.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the task template.

nested_items.name: ContactFlowId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the flow that runs by default when a task is created by referencing this template.

nested_items.name: SelfAssignFlowId
nested_items.description: ContactFlowId for the flow that will be run if this template is used to create a self-assigned task.

nested_items.name: Constraints
nested_items.description: Constraints that are applicable to the fields listed.

nested_items.name: RequiredFields
nested_items.description: Lists the fields that are required to be filled by agents.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_items.name: ReadOnlyFields
nested_items.description: Lists the fields that are read-only to agents, and cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_items.name: InvisibleFields
nested_items.description: Lists the fields that are invisible to agents.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_items.name: DefaultFieldValues
nested_items.description: Default value for the field.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: Default value for the field.

nested_items.name: Fields
nested_items.description: Fields that are part of the template.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the task template field.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the field.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of field.

nested_items.name: SingleSelectOptions
nested_items.description: A list of options for a single select field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Marks a template as ACTIVE or INACTIVE for a task to refer to it. Tasks can only be created from ACTIVE templates. If a template is marked as INACTIVE, then a task that refers to this template cannot be created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the task template was last modified.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the task template was created.
(string) ---
(string) ---
